Qualifiers.title: Maximum floor area for detached 2nd dwelling unit
Qualifiers.scope: Site planning for detached second-dwelling units (accessory/secondary dwelling on the same lot as a main dwelling)
applicability: Interior lot example (illustrative); applicability likely general but only interior-lot layout is shown
notes: The label 'Detached 2nd dwelling unit 900 sf max' appears in all scenarios (A–D), indicating a global cap for the detached 2nd unit on these examples.

Variables.name: second_unit_floor_area
Variables.description: Gross floor area of the detached second-dwelling unit

targets: Scenarios A, B, C, D (the detached 2nd unit in each is labeled '900 sf max')

Qualifiers.title: Location allowances for detached garages relative to front lot line distance
Qualifiers.scope: Location of detached parking garages serving the main dwelling, second dwelling, or both
applicability: Detached garages on interior lots (illustrative); condition likely general
notes: Text in Scenarios A and C: 'Because it is detached and at least 75' from the front lot line, it may be located in the rear and side yards.'

Variables.name: garage_attachment
Variables.description: Attachment status of garage to a dwelling

Variables.name: distance_from_front_lot_line
Variables.description: Horizontal distance from the garage to the front lot line

Variables.name: garage_location_zone
Variables.description: Yard or area where the detached garage is sited

Constants.name: rear_side_yard_distance_threshold
Constants.source: Scenario A and C parenthetical text

Conditions.rule: IF garage_attachment == 'detached' AND distance_from_front_lot_line >= rear_side_yard_distance_threshold THEN garage_location_zone IN {'rear_yard','side_yard'}

targets: Scenario C (shared 2-car detached for both dwellings)
Rule: Location requirements for attached garages

Qualifiers.title: Location requirements for attached garages
Qualifiers.scope: Attached garages serving either the main dwelling or the 2nd dwelling
notes: Scenario B parenthetical: 'Because attached, it must be located within the building area rather than in the rear or side yards.'

Variables.name: garage_attachment
Variables.description: Attachment status of garage to a dwelling

Variables.name: garage_location_zone
Variables.description: Placement relative to site yard/buildable area

Conditions.rule: IF garage_attachment == 'attached' THEN garage_location_zone == 'buildable_area' AND garage_location_zone NOT IN {'rear_yard','side_yard'}

targets: Scenario B (2nd unit has 1-car attached garage)
Scenario D (shared 2-car attached garage at the main dwelling)
Rule: Location allowances for detached garages relative to front lot line distance

Qualifiers.title: Use of driveway to satisfy uncovered parking spaces relative to front setback
Qualifiers.scope: Uncovered parking spaces for the main dwelling and the detached 2nd dwelling
applicability: Interior lot example (illustrative) in Scenarios A–D
notes: All scenarios state: 'Both dwellings use the driveway for their uncovered spaces (beyond front setback)'.
Directionality of 'beyond' (in front of vs. behind the front setback line) is not explicitly defined here; typical practice implies behind the front setback line.

Variables.name: parking_space_cover
Variables.description: Whether the space is covered or uncovered

Variables.name: parking_location
Variables.description: Feature used to provide the parking space

Variables.name: position_relative_to_front_setback
Variables.description: Relative position of the space to the front setback line

Conditions.rule: IF parking_space_cover == 'uncovered' AND parking_location == 'driveway' THEN position_relative_to_front_setback == 'beyond_front_setback'

targets: Legend item: 'Area that may not be used to satisfy required parking spaces' (details not provided here)

Qualifiers.title: Permissible garage configurations for main and detached 2nd dwelling units (examples)
Qualifiers.scope: Acceptable configurations for covered parking serving the main dwelling and a detached 2nd dwelling unit
exclusions: This set is presented as examples and may not be exhaustive
notes: The figure caption states 'Examples of site planning solutions...', indicating non-exhaustive illustrative compliance options.
Covered parking capacities shown are 1-car or 2-car, consistent with one covered space per dwelling in the examples; this is not explicitly codified here.

Variables.name: main_dwelling_garage
Variables.description: Covered parking for the main dwelling

Variables.name: second_dwelling_garage
Variables.description: Covered parking for the detached 2nd dwelling

Variables.name: shared_garage
Variables.description: Whether covered parking is a single shared structure serving both dwellings

Conditions.name: Scenario A
Conditions.rule: main_dwelling_garage.attachment == 'attached' AND main_dwelling_garage.capacity_cars == 1 AND second_dwelling_garage.attachment == 'detached' AND second_dwelling_garage.capacity_cars == 1 AND shared_garage == false
notes: Detached 2nd unit garage may be in rear/side yards if 75' from front lot line (see detached garage location rule).

Conditions.name: Scenario B
Conditions.rule: main_dwelling_garage.attachment == 'attached' AND main_dwelling_garage.capacity_cars == 1 AND second_dwelling_garage.attachment == 'attached' AND second_dwelling_garage.capacity_cars == 1 AND shared_garage == false
notes: Attached 2nd unit garage must be within buildable area (not rear/side yards).

Conditions.name: Scenario C
Conditions.rule: shared_garage == true AND main_dwelling_garage.attachment == 'shared_detached' AND second_dwelling_garage.attachment == 'shared_detached' AND main_dwelling_garage.capacity_cars + second_dwelling_garage.capacity_cars == 2
notes: Shared detached 2-car garage may be in rear/side yards if 75' from front lot line.

Conditions.name: Scenario D
Conditions.rule: shared_garage == true AND main_dwelling_garage.attachment == 'shared_attached' AND second_dwelling_garage.attachment == 'shared_attached' AND main_dwelling_garage.capacity_cars + second_dwelling_garage.capacity_cars == 2
notes: Shared attached 2-car garage must be within buildable area.

Exceptions.description: Configurations are labeled as examples; other configurations may comply if they meet all applicable standards.

targets: Rule: Location allowances for detached garages relative to front lot line distance
Rule: Location requirements for attached garages
Rule: Use of driveway to satisfy uncovered parking spaces relative to front setback

Qualifiers.title: Minimum rear-yard dimension (value not legible in source image)
Qualifiers.scope: Rear-yard minimum dimension shown on interior lot examples
applicability: All scenarios show a vertical dimension arrow in rear yard labeled '—' min
notes: The numerical value preceding 'min' is not legible in the provided scan; cannot be confirmed from this page.

Exceptions.description: Value unreadable; must be sourced from clearer copy or governing code text before enforcement.

targets: Scenarios A, B, C, D (rear-yard arrow labeled '—' min.)

Qualifiers.title: Possible maximum floor area for 1-car garages (unconfirmed)
Qualifiers.scope: Garage floor area for single-car garages in the examples
applicability: Small labels near 1-car garage symbols in Scenarios A and B
notes: Small text appears to read '200 sf max' but is faint; cannot be confirmed from this image alone.

Variables.name: one_car_garage_floor_area
Variables.description: Floor area of a single-car garage

Constants.name: one_car_garage_floor_area_max_candidate
Constants.source: Faint diagram label near 1-car garages in Scenarios A and B

Conditions.rule: IF one_car_garage_floor_area_max_candidate is confirmed externally THEN one_car_garage_floor_area <= one_car_garage_floor_area_max_candidate

Exceptions.description: Do not enforce without independent confirmation of the 200 sf maximum from authoritative text.

targets: Scenarios A and B (near '1-car' garage labels)

Qualifiers.title: Areas prohibited for satisfying required parking spaces (legend reference only)
Qualifiers.scope: Site areas that may not be counted toward required parking
applicability: Legend item: 'Area that may not be used to satisfy required parking spaces'
notes: The legend indicates such areas exist but does not define them in text or values on this page.

Variables.name: prohibited_parking_areas
Variables.description: Mapped site areas where required parking cannot be located

Conditions.rule: Required parking spaces shall not be located within prohibited_parking_areas

Exceptions.description: Prohibited areas not delineated here; must be obtained from full code or legend key mapping.

targets: Rule: Use of driveway to satisfy uncovered parking spaces relative to front setback
